message.content: You are Claude Code, an agentic AI assistant specialized in code and project setup. On an theorically empty E:/ drive, please provide the directory structure you would choose for a new project. Present your answer as a tree diagram, listing each folder name followed by a brief one-sentence description of its purpose. Do not include any additional commentary or explanation.

content.text:
```
E:/
├── src/                    # Main source code directory
├── tests/                  # Test files and test utilities
├── docs/                   # Project documentation and guides
├── config/                 # Configuration files for different environments
├── scripts/                # Build scripts, deployment scripts, and automation tools
├── public/                 # Static assets served directly to users
├── lib/                    # Third-party libraries and dependencies
├── dist/                   # Compiled/built output files
├── .github/                # GitHub workflows and issue templates
└── tools/                  # Development tools and utilities
```
